list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor BottomBar styles for improved alignment.
Adjusted the dimensions and layout styles of the BottomBar components to ensure consistent alignment and spacing. These updates enhance the visual appearance and responsiveness of the navbar across devices.

task.summary:
Initialize base React application with default setup
Set up a React application using Create React App with default files, configurations, and dependencies. Added `.gitignore` for file exclusions, core source files (`App.js`, `App.css`, `index.js`, etc.), and testing setup. Included base project configurations like `package.json`, `package-lock.json`, and IntelliJ IDEA settings.

Initialize base React application with default setup
Set up a React application using Create React App with default files, configurations, and dependencies. Added `.gitignore` for file exclusions, core source files (`App.js`, `App.css`, `index.js`, etc.), and testing setup. Included base project configurations like `package.json`, `package-lock.json`, and IntelliJ IDEA settings.

Initialize base React application with default setup
Set up a React application using Create React App with default files, configurations, and dependencies. Added `.gitignore` for file exclusions, core source files (`App.js`, `App.css`, `index.js`, etc.), and testing setup. Included base project configurations like `package.json`, `package-lock.json`, and IntelliJ IDEA settings.

Add MIT license file to repository
Included a new LICENSE file under the MIT License to clearly define usage, distribution, and warranty terms. This ensures transparency and compliance for software contributors and users. The license specifically covers the "CDI-Frontend Centralized Dashboard Interface."

Add Bootstrap 5.3.3 to project dependencies
Bootstrap 5.3.3 has been added to both `package.json` and `package-lock.json`, along with its peer dependency `@popperjs/core`. This update allows integration of Bootstrap styling and components into the project.

Add Bootstrap and React-Bootstrap dependencies
Updated `package.json` and `package-lock.json` to include `bootstrap` and `react-bootstrap` dependencies, along with related peer and sub-dependencies (`@popperjs/core`, etc.). This enables enhanced styling and UI component capabilities. Updated project configuration files, ensuring compatibility with the updated dependencies.

Add Bootstrap styles and scripts to the project
Replaced the unused `reportWebVitals` import with Bootstrap CSS, JS, and icon files. This enhances the application's styling and layout capabilities using Bootstrap's framework. Adjusted code formatting for consistency.

Add React Router and update App with navigation
Integrated `react-router-dom` for routing and navigation management within the app. Updated `App.js` to include desktop and mobile navigation layouts using Bootstrap styling. Adjusted dependencies in `package.json` and `package-lock.json` for compatibility.

Remove Sidebar and simplify layout structure
The Sidebar component and its related styles were removed to streamline the layout. Page components were also simplified, and redundant code for differentiating mobile and desktop views was eliminated. This results in a cleaner and more maintainable codebase.

Add responsive Sidebar and refactor layout structure
Introduced a Sidebar component for improved desktop navigation, alongside a BottomBar for mobile views. Adjusted the layout to ensure proper responsiveness using Bootstrap. Enhanced route handling and page alignment for a streamlined user experience.

Add responsive Sidebar and refactor layout structure
Introduced a Sidebar for desktop and BottomBar for mobile to improve navigation and responsiveness. Leveraged Bootstrap for consistent styling and adjusted route handling for better user experience. These changes enhance maintainability and usability across devices.

Update nav icons to use consistent Bootstrap icons
Replaced existing icons in the navigation with more suitable or visually consistent Bootstrap icons. This improves the clarity of the UI and aligns the design across the app. No functionality was affected.

Add TopBar and enhance navigation layout
Introduced a TopBar for improved desktop navigation and updated UI elements for consistency. Adjusted Sidebar and BottomBar designs to align with the new layout, ensuring responsiveness across devices. Improved overall visual clarity and maintainability without affecting core functionality.

Add routes and enhance navigation layout
Added new routes for Notifications, Settings, and Profile pages, along with updated navigation links for improved user experience. Refactored page title logic and redesigned navigation elements to ensure consistency and responsiveness across devices. These changes enhance clarity, maintainability, and overall usability without altering core functionality.

Adjust UI spacing and shadows for improved layout consistency.
Updated heights and top margins of elements to ensure better alignment across components. Enhanced shadow styles for a softer and more modern appearance. These changes improve overall visual consistency and user experience.

Add MobileTopBar and adjust layout for responsiveness
Introduced a MobileTopBar component to enhance navigation on mobile devices, including dynamic page titles and back navigation support. Updated UI spacing, element heights, and shadow styles across components for better alignment and visual consistency. These improvements ensure a more responsive and user-friendly interface.

Refactor BottomBar styles for improved alignment.
Adjusted dimensions and layout styles of BottomBar components to ensure consistent alignment and spacing. These changes improve the visual appearance and responsiveness of the navbar across devices.

MESSAGE.value:
Add MIT License to the project
This commit introduces the MIT License to the project, granting users broad rights to use, modify, and distribute the software. It ensures compliance with proper copyright attribution and disclaims liability for any issues arising from its use.

Initialize base React application with default setup
Set up a React application using Create React App with default files, configurations, and dependencies. Added `.gitignore` for file exclusions, core source files (`App.js`, `App.css`, `index.js`, etc.), and testing setup. Included base project configurations like `package.json`, `package-lock.json`, and IntelliJ IDEA settings.

Add MIT license file to repository
Included a new LICENSE file under the MIT License to clearly define usage, distribution, and warranty terms. This ensures transparency and compliance for software contributors and users. The license specifically covers the "CDI-Frontend Centralized Dashboard Interface."

Add Bootstrap 5.3.3 to project dependencies
Bootstrap 5.3.3 has been added to both `package.json` and `package-lock.json`, along with its peer dependency `@popperjs/core`. This update allows integration of Bootstrap styling and components into the project.

Add Bootstrap and React-Bootstrap dependencies
Updated `package.json` and `package-lock.json` to include `bootstrap` and `react-bootstrap` dependencies, along with related peer and sub-dependencies (`@popperjs/core`, etc.). This enables enhanced styling and UI component capabilities. Updated project configuration files, ensuring compatibility with the updated dependencies.

Add Bootstrap styles and scripts to the project
Replaced the unused `reportWebVitals` import with Bootstrap CSS, JS, and icon files. This enhances the application's styling and layout capabilities using Bootstrap's framework. Adjusted code formatting for consistency.

Add React Router and update App with navigation
Integrated `react-router-dom` for routing and navigation management within the app. Updated `App.js` to include desktop and mobile navigation layouts using Bootstrap styling. Adjusted dependencies in `package.json` and `package-lock.json` for compatibility.

Integrate React Router and enhance navigation UI
Added `react-router-dom` for managing routes across the app. Updated navigation with a responsive Sidebar and BottomBar, utilizing Bootstrap styling. Refactored pages into separate components for better readability and maintainability.

Remove Sidebar and simplify layout structure
The Sidebar component and its related styles were removed to streamline the layout. Page components were also simplified, and redundant code for differentiating mobile and desktop views was eliminated. This results in a cleaner and more maintainable codebase.

Add responsive Sidebar and refactor layout structure
Introduced a Sidebar component for improved desktop navigation, alongside a BottomBar for mobile views. Adjusted the layout to ensure proper responsiveness using Bootstrap. Enhanced route handling and page alignment for a streamlined user experience.

Add responsive Sidebar and refactor layout structure
Introduced a Sidebar for desktop and BottomBar for mobile to improve navigation and responsiveness. Leveraged Bootstrap for consistent styling and adjusted route handling for better user experience. These changes enhance maintainability and usability across devices.

Update nav icons to use consistent Bootstrap icons
Replaced existing icons in the navigation with more suitable or visually consistent Bootstrap icons. This improves the clarity of the UI and aligns the design across the app. No functionality was affected.

Add TopBar and enhance navigation layout
Introduced a TopBar for improved desktop navigation and updated UI elements for consistency. Adjusted Sidebar and BottomBar designs to align with the new layout, ensuring responsiveness across devices. Improved overall visual clarity and maintainability without affecting core functionality.

Add routes and enhance navigation layout
Added new routes for Notifications, Settings, and Profile pages, along with updated navigation links for improved user experience. Refactored page title logic and redesigned navigation elements to ensure consistency and responsiveness across devices. These changes enhance clarity, maintainability, and overall usability without altering core functionality.

Adjust UI spacing and shadows for improved layout consistency.
Updated heights and top margins of elements to ensure better alignment across components. Enhanced shadow styles for a softer and more modern appearance. These changes improve overall visual consistency and user experience.

Add responsive MobileTopBar and refine layout design
Introduced a MobileTopBar component to enhance mobile navigation and display dynamic page titles. Adjusted UI spacing, element heights, and shadow styles for improved consistency and clarity. These updates enhance responsiveness, usability, and visual appeal across devices.

Add MobileTopBar and adjust layout for responsiveness
Introduced a MobileTopBar component to enhance navigation on mobile devices, including dynamic page titles and back navigation support. Updated UI spacing, element heights, and shadow styles across components for better alignment and visual consistency. These improvements ensure a more responsive and user-friendly interface.

Refactor layout and styling for consistency and clarity
Adjusted component styles, spacing, and structure for improved visual consistency across breakpoints. Simplified container classes and optimized layout padding and margins to enhance maintainability and responsiveness.

Refactor BottomBar styles for improved alignment.
Adjusted dimensions and layout styles of BottomBar components to ensure consistent alignment and spacing. These changes improve the visual appearance and responsiveness of the navbar across devices.
